Name: Interitus
About the game: ABOUT THIS GAME: Travel to the Hidden Monastery to the East In Interitus you play as a young elf, Liara, plagued by a soul-corrupting curse who must travel to a long-forgotten monastery located far behind the vast forests of the world of Nai'ru. You must fight through countless enemies and ensure your survival through the maze-like corridors of the monastery while searching for keys to open doors and progress further into the darkness. Defeat the boss and find the cure to your curse and unveil the secrets of the environment to complete the game. Interitus is a dark and atmospheric Souls-like with Roguelite-elements, realistic 3D graphics and a grotesque, medieval-styled environment. Slash your way through monsters with satisfying combat moves and find your way through the ever-changing dungeon, that is built different with every playthrough. BEAUTIFUL VISUALS: Immerse yourself with enchanting visuals, stunning 2d-cutscenes and a dazzling beastiary!
